meta.description: AGGREGATORS - Secondary sources that belong to modules. Each aggregator is subordinate to a module.
meta.note: Sources in sources.json reference these via 'aggregator' field

OCCRP_ALEPH.name: OCCRP Aleph
OCCRP_ALEPH.description: 237 collections across 75+ jurisdictions - company registries, sanctions, courts, procurement, leaks

OPENCORPORATES.name: OpenCorporates
OPENCORPORATES.description: Global company registry aggregator - 200M+ companies across 140+ jurisdictions

OPENOWNERSHIP.name: Open Ownership
OPENOWNERSHIP.description: Beneficial ownership data from multiple jurisdictions

DEHASHED.name: DeHashed
DEHASHED.description: Breach database - emails, passwords, usernames, IPs

OSINT_INDUSTRIES.name: OSINT Industries
OSINT_INDUSTRIES.description: Multi-source OSINT - social profiles, contact info, breaches

ROCKETREACH.name: RocketReach
ROCKETREACH.description: Professional contact discovery - emails, phones, LinkedIn

WHOISXML.name: WhoisXML API
WHOISXML.description: Domain WHOIS, reverse WHOIS, DNS history

ARCHIVE_ORG.name: Internet Archive / Wayback Machine
ARCHIVE_ORG.description: Historical web snapshots and CDX index

COMMONCRAWL.name: Common Crawl
COMMONCRAWL.description: Web archive - link graphs, historical content, WARC records

MAJESTIC.name: Majestic
MAJESTIC.description: Backlink database - referring domains, trust flow, citation flow

FIRECRAWL.name: Firecrawl
FIRECRAWL.description: Modern web scraping - JS rendering, markdown extraction
